name: Nomaintenance
body:
I made this game when i was younger in vb6. Now it's back, converted to work modern computers.

The code is ugly, but the gaming experience is awesome. Feel free to join or fork if you want to be a part of the Spaghetti code.

![Screenshot 1](http://mattias.xn--laserskld-67a.se/hemsida/NM1.png)
![Screenshot 2](http://mattias.xn--laserskld-67a.se/hemsida/NM2.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
